sentences.en: Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer - James Fenimore Cooper.
sentences.cn: ‘麝鼠城堡’这个名字是一些爱开玩笑的官员给这座房子取的滑稽名字—— 詹姆士·菲里莫尔·库珀。

sentences.en: Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer.
sentences.cn: 麝鼠城堡作为房屋的名称，是由某些诙谐的官员起的滑稽名称。

sentences.en: During this melancholy pause , the turnkey read his newspaper with a waggish look.
sentences.cn: 在这个忧郁的停歇期间, 看守滑稽地阅读着报纸.

sentences.en: It has the waggish adorableness and the tripping-and-falling roughhouse of other animated films, but it’s also a work of tragic nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 这部电影不但像其他动画作品一样有着滑稽可爱的动画角色,和跌宕起伏的嬉闹场面,同时,它也不失为一部充满悲剧色彩得感伤作品。

sentences.en: Muskrat Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer - James Fenimore Cooper.
sentences.cn: ‘麝鼠城堡’这个名字是一些爱开玩笑的官员给这座房子取的滑稽名字 —— 詹姆士·菲里莫尔·库珀.

sentences.en: Muskrat Castle as the house has been facetiously named by some waggish officer.
sentences.cn: 麝鼠城堡作为房屋的名称,是由某些诙谐的官员起的滑稽名称.

sentences.en: Muskrat Castle, as the house had Been facetiously named By some waggish officer.
sentences.cn: 麝鼠城堡作为房屋的名称，是由某些诙谐的官员起的滑稽名称。

sentences.en: The house had been facetiously named by some waggish officer.
sentences.cn: 这房子是由某个机智幽默的军官命名的。

trans.tran_cn: <非正>（似）滑稽 （者）的，诙谐的，淘气的，爱恶作剧的
trans.tran_en: a waggish person makes clever and amusing jokes, remarks etc
